title: tADiDu nan manamE
sahitya:
tEDiDu nan manamE un cittattilE uLLa sattiya vastuvait-


anupallavi

  ODi alaindu nI vADik-kulaiyAdE uLLattilE inba veLLam tadumbum adait-


caraNam    satta madangaLilE verum sAppATTu sandaiyin kUppATTilE illai
shuddha svayam jyOtiyai ETTu shollAlum kaTTiDak-kallAlum kANbamO
sokkum anbuk-koDiyil mokkavizhndUruginra pakkuvat-tEnai nI mikkap-parugiDavE
